00055 struct ciLessBoost : std::binary_function<std::string, std::string, bool>
00056 {
00057     bool operator() (const std::string & s1, const std::string & s2) const {
00058                                                //case insensitive version of is_less
00059         return lexicographical_compare(s1, s2, is_iless());
00060     }
00061 };

00160         // This is the interface to the Ogre resource system. It allows us to
00161         // load NIFs from BSAs, in the file system and in any other place we
00162         // tell Ogre to look (eg. in zip or rar files.) It's also used to
00163         // check for the existence of texture files, so we can exchange the
00164         // extension from .tga to .dds if the texture is missing.
